event.name: Resort

event.desc: Washington D.C. the tourist hotspot. Photo by Mikhail Nilov: https://www.pexels.com/photo/a-female-tourist-talking-to-the-female-receptionist-of-the-hotel-7820311/

event.name: Resort Pool
